mapper.select: select count(t.task_code) as user_task_count from project_tasks t inner join project_task_managers tm on t.task_code=tm.task_code join users u on tm.task_manager_id=u.user_id where u.user_id=#{userId}
select count(i.issue_code) as user_issue_count from project_issues i inner join users u on i.issue_user_id=u.user_id where u.user_id=#{userId}
select count(o.output_code) as user_output_count from project_outputs o inner join users u on o.output_name=u.user_id where u.user_id=#{userId}
select count(p.project_code) as user_project_count from projects p inner join project_members pm on p.project_code=pm.project_code join users u on pm.user_id=u.user_id where u.user_id=#{userId}

select count(t.task_status_code) as task_status, ts.task_status as task_status_name from project_tasks t, project_task_status ts, project_task_managers tm where tm.task_manager_id=#{userId} and tm.task_code=t.task_code and t.task_status_code=ts.task_status_code group by t.task_status_code, ts.task_status

select count(i.issue_code) as issue_status, it.issue_type as issue_status_name from project_issues i, project_issue_types it where i.issue_user_id=#{userId} and i.issue_type_code=it.issue_type_code group by i.issue_code, it.issue_type

select * from(select t.*, p.project_name from project_tasks t inner join project_task_groups tg on t.taskGroup_code=tg.taskGroup_code join projects p on tg.project_code=p.project_code join project_members pm on p.project_code=pm.project_code where pm.user_id=#{userId} order by (select to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') from dual) - to_char(p.project_start, 'YYYYMMDD') ASC) where ROWNUM<=3 order by task_start ASC

select pt.task_name, o.output_date, o.output_name, p.project_name from project_outputs o inner join project_tasks pt on o.task_code=pt.task_code join project_task_groups ptg on pt.taskgroup_code=ptg.taskgroup_code join projects p on ptg.project_code=p.project_code where o.output_user=#{userId}
